channel.title: albumclub on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in albumclub on Paul Cutler

item.title: Join the Album Club
item.description: One of the things I’ve been enjoying as I took a blogging break (that’s over, I swear!) is enjoying Album Club. What is Album Club, you ask? Every Tuesday night at 9 p.m. CDT, listeners gather on Twitter and listen to the same album and tweet their thoughts, remembrances and more about the album. The tweets range from information about the recording of the album to humor to scathing criticism.
